H0.text: Which band was founded by Chris Difford and Glenn Tilbrook in 1974. The Stranglers

H1.text: Which band was founded by Chris Difford and Glenn Tilbrook in 1974. The Jam

H2.text: Which band was founded by Chris Difford and Glenn Tilbrook in 1974. XTC

H3.text: Which band was founded by Chris Difford and Glenn Tilbrook in 1974. SQUEEZE

A4.text: The band's founding members in March 1974 were Chris Difford (guitar, vocals, lyrics), and Glenn Tilbrook (vocals, guitar, music).

A5.text: The group performed under several names, most frequently 'Captain Trundlow's Sky Company' or 'Skyco', before selecting the band name 'Squeeze' as a facetious tribute to the Velvet Underground's oft-derided 1973 album Squeeze.
